BritAsia TV

SEO; Web Dev.

Brief

I completed a freelance contract with BritAsia TV, consulting with them on how to improve their online output to generate more visibility.

This contract helped me continue my then mission of changing the way music is consumed in the Punjabi industry by creating original and boundary-pushing content, and giving it the best visibility online through SEO.

Process

During this project, I used much of the lessons I had learned from building my own website -- Punchline Punjabi -- in this space, and provided both content- and technical-side improvements via comprehensive audits.

To get the ball rolling on the changes, I worked with their developers to request changes to improve, for example, page speed and layout shifts in preparation of the Core Web Vitals update. I also formed a content strategy based on keyword research, as well as writing some detailed articles as I had done on Punchline Punjabi.

As some of the articles were being syndicated between the Punchline Punjabi and BritAsia TV websites, I had to write custom JavaScript to dynamically inject canonicals, which also needed to hook into Webflow's CMS.
